Department: Yong Siew Toh Conservatory Of Music
ModuleDescription: In this module, the art and science of orchestral percussion auditions is imparted in a blend of theory and mock auditions. Audition strategies and techniques are related and reinforced, including defeating physical manifestations of nervousness (such as cold or shaking hands), goal-oriented training in a wide variety of instruments, and performing at peak levels on all families of percussion instruments on any given day.
Prerequisite: MUA1150 Basic Mechanics of Percussion B
